entry.title: Blog Archive
entry.summary: The older site had a Blog feature with posts from 2017 - 2020.
entry.content:
The older site had a Blog feature with posts from 2017 - 2020.
TidalCycles Blog Archive

Content to explore:

  • Interviews
    • Malitzin Cortes aka CNDSD
    • Kindohm aka Mike Hodnick
  • Summer of Haskell Project
  • Six Months of Tidal

Some of the posts may be dated, or refer to older versions of Tidal. But it is still interesting to reflect on how things have evolved.

entry.title: New Documentation
entry.summary: I've started working on a major overhaul / reorganization of the old Tidal Userbase website. I think that this new documentation is now pretty much on par with the old one. I hope that you will like it.
entry.content: I've started working on a major overhaul / reorganization of the old Tidal Userbase website. I think that this new documentation is now pretty much on par with the old one. I hope that you will like it.
